item.title: PLUG
item.description: score:-42 Chances: With the Fed forecasting more rate cuts than initially expected in 2024, some of this year’s most beaten-down areas of the market are in rally mode. In this piece, we will take a look at the 12 best clean energy stocks to buy according to billionaires.
